thread.title: Watch: Technical Difficulties Ruin Metallica's Grammy Performance, James Hetfield Throws Guitar Onstage | Music News @ Ultimate-Guitar.Com
thread.title_full: Watch: Technical Difficulties Ruin Metallica's Grammy Performance, James Hetfield Throws Guitar Onstage | Music News @ Ultimate-Guitar.Com

title: Watch: Technical Difficulties Ruin Metallica's Grammy Performance, James Hetfield Throws Guitar Onstage | Music News @ Ultimate-Guitar.Com
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 8 minutes ago 0 
Last night at the Grammy Awards show, Metallica's " Moth Into Flame " duet with Lady Gaga was marred by technical difficulties as James Hetfield's microphone didn't work. 
The issue forced the frontman to share the mic with Gaga for the entirety of the performance. 
Visibly irritated after the show, James kicked the faulty mic and threw his guitar. 
During the rest of the evening, the Grammy folks made another gaffe by playing " Master of Puppets " as Megadeth won the Best Metal Performance award. 
You can watch the footage below. A pissed off James Hetfield tosses his guitar #Metallica #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/6BXzFvnFZR
